metadata.title: North Coastal Ocean Dynamics Experiment (NCODE)
metadata.description: Hydrography, currents, and water properties of the north coast of British Columbia, 1983-1985.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.
